(Hope my husband doesn't mind) Angie

Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2011 05:03AM JackieMom wrote: I had BMX w TE on February 14.  Still having fills for TE.  Chemo is forthcoming.  Have appt later this week.  Very encouraged by my recovery thus far.
Posts.Title: February 2011 Mastectomy texasrose361 TinaT

Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2011 05:14AM JackieMom wrote: I'm noticing a recurring theme...the inability to move bowels.  I drank prune juice twice and that got it started!!  May be a non issue if it has restarted, but if not please drink a glass or two of prune juice.  Put it in a wine / martini glass so you at least can pretend you are going to enjoy it.  Typically within about 4-5 hours you will be normal again!!
Posts.Title: February 2011 Mastectomy texasrose361 TinaT
